typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDate as string,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as short,
		{Unit Price} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(TotalCost = Units*{Unit Price},
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sort(asc(Region, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderDate as string,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as double,
		UnitCost as double,
		TotalCost as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderDate,
		Region,
		Rep,
		Item,
		Units,
		UnitCost = {Unit Price},
		TotalCost
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
